titleStmt.title: A further vindication of the dissenters from the Rector of Bury's unjust accusations wherein his charge of their being corupters of the word of God is demonstrated to be false and malicious ... / by James Owen.
titleStmt.author: Owen, James, 1654-1706.
Gipps, Thomas, d. 1709.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by S. Bridge for Tho. Parkhurst,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
